elements.name: 1) Verify details of Hotels and its associated locations is fetched for paris city

steps.name: I should get http status "200" in response
I verify response content type is JSON
I verify number of records in body for jsonpath "hotels" is "5"
I fetch a single record using jsonPath "hotels.hotelId" and value "4026401" from response
I validate below jsonpaths and values in response
I fetch a single record using jsonPath "locations.placeId" and value "ChIJD7fiBh9u5kcRYJSMaMOCCwQ" from response
I validate below jsonpaths and values in response

elements.name: 2) Validation Scenarios for Query parameter : Pass invalid city

steps.name: I should get http status "200" in response
I verify response content type is JSON
I verify number of records in body for jsonpath "hotels" is "0"

elements.name: 2) Validation Scenarios - PostHotelSearch : Pass checkin date greater than checkout
